actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Select Education and Civil Rights.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Select Education and Civil Rights

official_title: To amend the Family Violence Prevention and Services Act to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to administer a Federal demonstration program to coordinate response and strategy within many sectors of local communities for intervention and prevention of domestic violence.
short_title: Domestic Violence Community Initiative Act of 1993

summary.text: Domestic Violence Community Initiative Act of 1993 - Amends the Family Violence Prevention and Services Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to provide grants to nonprofit private organizations to establish local community intervention and domestic violence prevention projects. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Domestic Violence Community Initiative Act of 1993

To amend the Family Violence Prevention and Services Act to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to administer a Federal demonstration program to coordinate response and strategy within many sectors of local communities for intervention and prevention of domestic violence.
